description: This file defines the TicketMetricEntry class, which models a single internal metric entry for tickets, including properties like application name, month, total tickets, SLA adherence percentage, and mean time to resolution (hours). It is used internally within the backend service, not as a public API resource.

classes.name: TicketMetricEntry
classes.description: A data model representing a ticket metric entry with application-specific metrics for a given month.

methods.name: TicketMetricEntry
methods.description: Default constructor for creating an empty TicketMetricEntry object.

methods.name: TicketMetricEntry
methods.description: Parameterized constructor for initializing all fields of TicketMetricEntry.

methods.name: getApplication
methods.description: Returns the application name associated with this metric.

methods.name: setApplication
methods.description: Sets the application name for this metric entry.

methods.name: getMonth
methods.description: Returns the month in yyyy-MM format for which this metric applies.

methods.name: setMonth
methods.description: Sets the month in yyyy-MM format.

methods.name: getTotalTickets
methods.description: Returns the total number of tickets.

methods.name: setTotalTickets
methods.description: Sets the total number of tickets.

methods.name: getMttrHours
methods.description: Returns the Mean Time To Resolution in hours.

methods.name: setMttrHours
methods.description: Sets the mean time to resolution in hours.
